channel.title: Server help- Helpers get to be admin!
channel.description:
Uhm, Hi. I am admin of DreamScape, and I am wondering if people are able to connect, Please help by. Trying to connect; Thanks!
IP:
[glow=red,2,300]m1ntscape.no-ip.info[/glow]
HAMACHI:
DreamScape <---- D and S are capitalized. pass: dream
---------=-= Please post if I am doing something wrong, I have the runserver.bat opened and running, I use moparscape. 3,1-
Thanks---
EDIT::: Anyone who helps will also get a nice, REP+ :)

item.description:
@KkrRiiTtOoNnIIte wrote:

EDIT::: Well, if anyone can; Add me on MSN, and we can discuss this, krypton_elf@yahoo.com
Thanks
